alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Columbia, northwestern Suwannee, Hamilton, western Camden, Echols, southwestern Brantley, southeastern Ware, southern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Race Pond to near Jennings. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Folkston, Jennings, Fargo, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Crossroads and Race Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
